title: Identifying septic shock subgroups to tailor fluid strategies through multi-omics integration
summary:
Nature Communications, Published online: 19 October 2024; doi:10.1038/s41467-024-53239-9

Fluid management in septic shock lacks personalized approaches, which are critical for improving patient outcomes. Here, the authors show that a proteomic signature can help identify patients who may benefit from a restrictive fluid strategy, potentially reducing hospital mortality rates.
